Pre-Game Insights: India lost the first T20I and are under pressure to keep the series alive
India's top order struggled in the first T20I, with Shubman Gill, Ishan Kishan, and Rahul Tripathi contributing only 11 runs from 17 balls
Prithvi Shaw is in the squad but is unlikely to replace Shubman Gill in the top order
New Zealand won the first T20I and are looking to seal the series in Lucknow
Glenn Phillips is yet to produce a substantial knock on the tour for New Zealand
Miscellaneous Highlights: All five T20Is hosted by the Ekana Stadium to date have been won by the side batting first
India's previous T20I in Lucknow was in February 2022
Others: The article discusses the team news, strategies, and player performances for both India and New Zealand in the upcoming 2nd T20I
The article also mentions the match preview for the 2nd T20I between India and New Zealand in Lucknow on January 29, 2023
